markdownRemark.html:
Inspired by Matisse cut out, I wanted to create the free forms made out of paper & scissor. I started using Paper.js to create a tree-like structure, and turned it into a drawing tool that can generate dynamic outlines for the skeleton.
The left video demonstrates how the tool works with the most basic structure â€“ 3 nodes. Later on I expaned the tool to create animation like the video at the right, by interpolating still frames that I composed. Below are the drawings created with the drawing tool.
